MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: The Penn Computerized Neurobehavioral Battery (CNB) is an online cognitive assessment consisting of a series of tasks that measure accuracy and speed of performance in major cognitive domains.

cnb_aim_aimtotrt.Description: AIM Median Response Time for Correct Responses (ms)

cnb_cptnl_letter_fn.Description: CPTNL False Negative Responses for Letter Trials

cnb_cptnl_letter_fp.Description: CPTNL False Positive Responses for Letter Trials

cnb_cptnl_letter_fprt.Description: CPTNL Median Response Time for False Positive Responses for Letter Trials (ms)

cnb_cptnl_letter_rt.Description: CPTNL Median Response Time for All Letter Responses (ms)

cnb_cptnl_letter_tp.Description: CPTNL True Positive Responses for Letter Trials

cnb_cptnl_total_lrsr.Description: CPTNL Longest Run of Same Responses

cnb_cptnl_total_rev_fp.Description: CPTNL Total Number Reversed Number Trial and Letter Trial False Positive Responses

cnb_cptnl_total_rev_fprt.Description: CPTNL Median Response Time for CPT Reversed Number Trial and Letter Trial False Positive Responses (ms)

er40_a_valid_code.Description: Validation Code for entire Penn Emotion Recognition Test (ER40)

mpract_valid_code.Description: Validation Code for entire Motor Praxis Test (MPRACT)

pvt-b_valid_code.Description: Validation Code for entire Psychomotor Vigilance Test - 3 Minute Version (PVT)

s_aim_a_valid_code.Description: Validation Code for entire Abstraction, Inhibition, and Memory Test (AIM)

s_digsym_valid_code.Description: Validation Code for entire Digit Symbol Test (DIGSYM)

slnb2_90_valid_code.Description: Validation Code for entire Short Letter-N-Back Test- 2 Back Version (LNB)

spcptnl108_valid_code.Description: Validation Code for entire Short Penn Continuous Performance Task - For Adaptive (CPTNL)

spvrt_a_valid_code.Description: Validation Code for entire Short Penn Logical Reasoning Test (PVRT)

svolt_a_valid_code.Description: Validation Code for entire Short Visual Object Learning Test (VOLT)

trail_b_valid_code.Description: Validation Code for entire Penn Trailmaking Test B (TRAILS)
